name: The Golden Crown
description:
The king has lost his crown to the ever shifting caves, under the dark of the forsaken castle. 

Delve through fifteen levels of the dungeon and enter the caves to find his crown, and save the realm, for without his crown the kingdom will surely fall...

Includes:

- 5 different weapons

- 4 unique spells

- Armour & rings

- Randomness

(Batteries not included)

-----------------------------------------CONTROLS-------------------------------------------

W - to move forward

S - to move backwards

A - to look left

D - to look right

H - to heal

RIGHT CLICK - to use spells

LEFT CLICK - to attack

-----------------------------------------CREDITS-------------------------------------------
